## React Native Developer @ BairesDev

``` React.js
class Vinnicius extends Human {
  name: string;
  nationality: string;
  
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.name = "Vinnicius Pierri";
    this.nationality = "Brazilian";
  }
  
  languages: Array<string> = [
    "Portuguese",
    "English",
  ];
  
  technologies: {

}
```
